name: Emojikara
description:
ツ So you say you have an addiction to emojis?

≥Ö‿Ö≤ Don't worry, so do we. We can help. >.<

≧◉◡◉≦ Featuring hundreds of emojis and over a hundred word puzzles.

(• ◡•) Emojis unlock as you play to use in creating your own emoji masterpiece!

◠ ‿ ◠ And, the source code for the game will be available to download for free too! Wow, that's nice and stuff.

Emojikara is what happens when emojis collide into a concentration matching game. Find two emojis that match the puzzle. It's simple, it's fun, you should get it right now!

Vote this for Greenlight please.

What's up with the name? Well, Emoji itself is a Japanese word that means picture. And what more do you want than having the power which is kara to make whatever you want out of them.

絵 e (picture) 文 mo (writing) 字 ji (character) = EMOJI
絵文字 EMOJI (picture+writing+character) + 力 KARA (power) = EMOJIKARA!

The source code for this game is available for you to mod, play, and Shakealike!

https://github.com/MissFacetious/emojikara

This game was made during the Midwest Game Jam. Visit my game making exploits @MissFacetious and Intropy Games
